author: Evelyn Cheng
title: China's cash-strapped poor seek more debt as coronavirus hits job prospects
description: Demand for consumer loans is picking up in China, especially among the less affluent, highlighting a group that some say could use more support during the coronavirus-induced economic downturn.
content:
Is China's debt burden too much to bear?
BEIJING  Demand for consumer loans is picking up in China, especially among the less affluent, highlighting a group that some say could use more support during the coronavirus-induced economic downturn.
